name: saidWot
overview:
saidWot is an online pr, branding and reputation management tool that helps you analyse your online brand reputation and value of your brand online.

saidWot is the brainchild of a group of active online media practitioners who believe in the endless possibilities of the medium. These specialists realise how damaging negative online perception and dialogue can be to a brand; and saw the need for a tool that allows clients to track and monitor their online reputation.

Two and a half years in the making, saidWot is now available to optimise your companyâ€™s valuable online image.

And rest assured, the saidWot tool is continuously updated and enhanced by qualified developers to keep up with an ever-changing online environment!

Agencies that use the saidWot product include:

  • Ogilvy Intercative South Africa
  • Virtuosa
  • Cerebra
  • Brandsh
  • Ogilvy Cape Town
  • Thoughtcorp
  • Vuma Reputation Management

Brands serviced through our Partner Agencies include: SAB Miller, IBM, Lucozade, Investec, Investec Private Bank, Investec Capital Markets, Investec Private Client Securities, Sony Ericsson South Africa, Werksmans Attorneys, Vodacom, Samsung, Vitamin Water, eBucks, Audi SA, Gijima AST, Danone.

Specialties Online Brand Value Management, Social Media Monitoring, Reputation Management Tool, Online Brand Health Audit, WebPR & SEO, ORM & Social Media Master Classes, Brand Audits & Strategy, eCRM & Analytics Reporting
